column4: HEy, I'm on my modem interface (i did this by typing 10.1.1.1 into my browser), and then i went to network setup, the add so i can host a website from my computer. a little pop up came up telling me to fill in some information about nat rules setup or something. What the hell do i do?
I just want to be able to have people access a few webpages!
Should only need to put the port into Single and Public POrt and the IP address of your internal IP
Ignore the NAT stuff you shouldnt need to touch it
